title: ssh: TestInvalidServerMessage fails
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

run unit tests repeatedly. this is after the TestServerWindow fix.

What do you see instead?

--- FAIL: TestInvalidServerMessage-49 (0.14 seconds)
session_test.go:49: Unable to accept incoming channel request: read tcp 127.0.0.1:52351:
connection reset by peer

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

linux

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

go version weekly.2012-03-27 +bae558ad6172

tip of go.crypto

Please provide any additional information below.
